item.description:
Let's get a nice group together for some golf this Sunday, July 11th at Hillview CC in North Reading. Forecast is scattered showers, so hopefully it will be great golf weather. Tee times I was able to reserve are 10:30 and 10:38 for 2 groups of 4. This is for 18 holes!

Per group guidelines, I'll be collecting the $1 fee for Zhen (Organizer of the group). Everyone is responsible for their own green fees.

Thanks!
Chuck
item.how_to_find_us: at clubhouse 15 minutes before first T time

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Hillview CC, Sun, July 11th
